languages.text: {n}Хейнрикс отстраняется от вас.{/n} "Ра... разумеется? Империум счел меня достаточно стабильным, чтобы оставить в роли санкционированного псайкера. Инквизиция дала мне новую, еще более высокую и достойную роль. Как я могу не выплачивать эти долги?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Хейнрикс отстраняется от вас.{/n} "Ра... разумеется? Империум счел меня достаточно стабильным, чтобы оставить при Гвардии в роли санкционированного псайкера. Инквизиция дала мне новую, еще более высокую и достойную роль. Как я могу не выплачивать эти долги своей службой?"

languages.text: {n}Heinrix pulls away from you.{/n} "Why... why wouldn't I be? The Imperium deemed me stable enough to keep me as a sanctioned psyker. The Inquisition gave me a new, higher role, a more honourable role. How could I not repay those debts?"
languages.original_text: {n}Хейнрикс отстраняется от вас.{/n} "Ра... разумеется? Империум счел меня достаточно стабильным, чтобы оставить в роли санкционированного псайкера. Инквизиция дала мне новую, еще более высокую и достойную роль. Как я могу не выплачивать эти долги?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix pulls away from you.{/n} "Why... why wouldn't I be? The Imperium deemed me stable enough to keep me as a sanctioned psyker. The Inquisition gave me a new, higher role, a more honourable role. How could I not repay those debts?"

{n}Heinrix pulls away from you.{/n} "Why... why wouldn't I be? The Imperium deemed me stable enough to keep me as a sanctioned psyker. The Inquisition gave me a new, higher role, a more honourable role. How could I not repay those debts?"

{n}Heinrix pulls away from you.{/n} "Why... why wouldn't I be? The Imperium deemed me stable enough to keep me as a sanctioned psyker. The Inquisition gave me a new, higher role, a more honourable role. How could I not repay those debts?"

{n}Heinrix pulls away from you.{/n} "Why... why wouldn't I be? The Imperium deemed me stable enough to keep me as a sanctioned psyker. The Inquisition gave me a new, higher role, a more honourable role. How could I not repay those debts?"

languages.text: {n}海因里希退开了一步。{/n}“我……我为什么要对帝国不忠呢？帝国认为我的力量很稳定，让我成为了得到授权的灵能者。审判庭还赐予了我更加崇高、更加光荣的新身份，我怎么能不偿还帝国的恩情呢？”
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix pulls away from you.{/n} "Why... why wouldn't I be? The Imperium deemed me stable enough to keep me as a sanctioned psyker. The Inquisition gave me a new, higher role, a more honourable role. How could I not repay those debts?"

traits.locale_text: {n}海因里希退开了一步。{/n}“我……我为什么要对帝国不忠呢？帝国认为我的力量很稳定，让我成为了得到授权的灵能者。审判庭还赐予了我更加崇高、更加光荣的新身份，我怎么能不偿还帝国的恩情呢？”

languages.text: {n}Heinrix se aleja de ti.{/n} «Por... ¿por qué no iba a serlo? El Imperium me consideró lo bastante estable como para nombrarme psíquico autorizado. La Inquisición me dio un papel nuevo, más elevado y honorable. ¿Cómo iba a no pagar esas deudas?».
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix pulls away from you.{/n} "Why... why wouldn't I be? The Imperium deemed me stable enough to keep me as a sanctioned psyker. The Inquisition gave me a new, higher role, a more honourable role. How could I not repay those debts?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix se aleja de ti.{/n} «Por... ¿por qué no iba a serlo? El Imperium me consideró lo bastante estable como para nombrarme psíquico autorizado. La Inquisición me dio un papel nuevo, más elevado y honorable. ¿Cómo iba a no pagar esas deudas?».

languages.text: {n}ハインリックスはあなたから離れる。{/n}「なぜ…？帝国は俺を認定異能者として十分安定しているとみなした。異端審問庁は俺に新しい、より高次な役割、より名誉ある役割を与えてくれた。その恩に報いるのは当然だろう？」
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix pulls away from you.{/n} "Why... why wouldn't I be? The Imperium deemed me stable enough to keep me as a sanctioned psyker. The Inquisition gave me a new, higher role, a more honourable role. How could I not repay those debts?"

traits.locale_text: {n}ハインリックスはあなたから離れる。{/n}「なぜ…？帝国は俺を認定異能者として十分安定しているとみなした。異端審問庁は俺に新しい、より高次な役割、より名誉ある役割を与えてくれた。その恩に報いるのは当然だろう？」

languages.text: {n}Heinrix a un mouvement de recul.{/n} « Pourquoi... Pourquoi en serait-il autrement ? L'Imperium m'a jugé suffisamment stable pour faire de moi un psyker assermenté, puis l'Inquisition m'a donné un rôle plus important et plus honorable. Que voulez-vous que je ressente d'autre, en dehors d'une immense gratitude ? »
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix pulls away from you.{/n} "Why... why wouldn't I be? The Imperium deemed me stable enough to keep me as a sanctioned psyker. The Inquisition gave me a new, higher role, a more honourable role. How could I not repay those debts?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix a un mouvement de recul.{/n} « Pourquoi... Pourquoi en serait-il autrement ? L'Imperium m'a jugé suffisamment stable pour faire de moi un psyker assermenté, puis l'Inquisition m'a donné un rôle plus important et plus honorable. Que voulez-vous que je ressente d'autre, en dehors d'une immense gratitude ? »

languages.text: {n}Heinrix zieht sich von dir zurück.{/n} "Warum ... warum sollte ich das nicht sein? Das Imperium hielt mich für stabil genug, um mich als sanktionierten Psioniker zu behalten. Die Inquisition gab mir eine neue, wichtigere Rolle, eine ehrenhaftere Rolle. Wie hätte ich da nicht meine Schuld zurückzahlen sollen?"
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix pulls away from you.{/n} "Why... why wouldn't I be? The Imperium deemed me stable enough to keep me as a sanctioned psyker. The Inquisition gave me a new, higher role, a more honourable role. How could I not repay those debts?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix zieht sich von dir zurück.{/n} "Warum ... warum sollte ich das nicht sein? Das Imperium hielt mich für stabil genug, um mich als sanktionierten Psioniker zu behalten. Die Inquisition gab mir eine neue, wichtigere Rolle, eine ehrenhaftere Rolle. Wie hätte ich da nicht meine Schuld zurückzahlen sollen?"

languages.text: {n}Heinrix kendini senden çekiyor.{/n} "Neden... Neden korumayayım? İmparatorluk, onaylı bir ruhsezer olarak tutulacak kadar istikrarlı olduğuma kanaat getirdi. Engizisyon ise bana yeni, daha güçlü ve çok daha onurlu bir rol bahşetti. Bu iyiliklerin karşılığını nasıl vermem?"
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix pulls away from you.{/n} "Why... why wouldn't I be? The Imperium deemed me stable enough to keep me as a sanctioned psyker. The Inquisition gave me a new, higher role, a more honourable role. How could I not repay those debts?"
